reference.shortdesc: The consequence element specifies the consequence of failing to avoid a hazard, for example, "Contact may cause burn."

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The consequence element is specialized from li. It is defined in the hazard-statement domain module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <hazardstatement type="warning"> <messagepanel> <typeofhazard>Hot surfaces inside.</typeofhazard> <consequence>Contact may cause burn.</consequence> <howtoavoid>Wear protective gear before servicing internal parts.</howtoavoid> </messagepanel> <hazardsymbol href="hotsurface.png"/> </hazardstatement>
